display_long_description:
In a future reshaped by the fall of a mysterious comet, humanity struggles between survival and domination. At the center of this fractured world stands Mulan, a young woman unknowingly carrying the hidden essence of Muk—a force that can both heal and destroy.
[media]
When her sheltered life collapses, she is drawn into a journey of betrayal, awakening, and sacrifice.
[media]
MULAN 2125 is not a traditional VR story but a bold new attempt—to unfold a continuous narrative through a series of episodes. 
[media]
Moving beyond the short 20–30 minute pieces of the past, it presents a tale of epic scale, dramatic twists, and powerful emotion. As the story advances, audiences are drawn ever deeper into Mulan’s world, experiencing it both as observers and as participants.
[media]
Crafted with film-grade CG standards, the production extends cinematic quality across visuals, sound, and motion design, delivering a cohesive and immersive audiovisual experience. From sweeping environments to nuanced performances, every detail is designed to envelop audiences in a living, breathing world.
For both newcomers and seasoned VR audiences, MULAN 2125 offers something unprecedented: not just a story to be watched, but a story to be lived—an emotional and sensory journey told through the language of immersive technology.
Officially selected for the Venice Immersive Competition 2025, MULAN 2125 represents a bold step forward in expanding the possibilities of immersive storytelling. Presented by Welllink.
